title: Self-Isolation
desc:
Post 2443
- You move yourself to <#1121925256823717929>. While in <#1121925256823717929>, you gain 1 **Card Shard** üîπ every turn but cannot be affected by draw or discard effects from other people.
- When a card is played with üéí, <:white:1107514189574045726>, <:outsiders:1108173904062722118>, ‚õìÔ∏è, <:lightgray:1120572654760505344>, <:gray:1107516393450127411>, <:black:1106265022453268530>, or <:wild:1106237191388143838>, the person in <#1121925256823717929> can be swapped with another player or the cell can be left empty. If left empty, then this <:outsiders:1108173904062722118> is removed.
- Additionally, if <#1121925256823717929> people have been attempted to be (cumulatively) impacted by 3+ discards or card draws from outside players, this <:outsiders:1108173904062722118> is removed.
